Dialogue.Page: Extinction is a mod I started working on a few years ago. I got about halfway through it, but I eventually stopped because I had lost a lot of ambition and was moving on to other things.
Most of what was left involved coding and writing, implementing puzzles and text, connecting everything, finishing a few structures, and playtesting.
Some ideas from Extinction ended up inspiring my Jam 3 mod, Symbiosis, so go check that out.
You can find me on the Outer Wilds modding discord as "Bird"!

DialogueOption.Text: Why is that guy locked in a cage?

Dialogue.Page: Oh, yeah, he was causing trouble so I put him in there. Don't worry about it.
